prompt_chain.title: Analyze Bracket Image Data
prompt_chain.description: Extract all competitor names, match numbers, stations, and bracket progression from the tournament bracket image
prompt_chain.test_criteria: All competitor names and match positions are correctly identified and documented
prompt_chain.implementation_notes: Focus on exact names, heat numbers, station assignments, and bracket flow

prompt_chain.title: Update WEC25 Data Structure
prompt_chain.description: Update WEC25BracketData.tsx with the exact competitor names and positions from the bracket image
prompt_chain.test_criteria: WEC25_COMPETITORS array contains all competitors with correct names and IDs
prompt_chain.implementation_notes: Ensure all 22 competitors are included with proper data structure

prompt_chain.title: Verify Bracket Structure
prompt_chain.description: Verify the bracket structure matches the image with correct heat numbers, stations, and progression
prompt_chain.test_criteria: All heats have correct station assignments and competitor positions match the image
prompt_chain.implementation_notes: Check Round 1 (Heats 1-16), Round 2 (Heats 17-24), Round 3 (Heats 25-28), Round 4 (Heats 29-30), and Final (Heat 31)

prompt_chain.title: Test Bracket Population
prompt_chain.description: Test that the bracket populates correctly with all competitors in their proper positions
prompt_chain.test_criteria: Bracket displays all competitors in correct positions with proper station colors
prompt_chain.implementation_notes: Verify drag-and-drop functionality and visual representation

prompt_chain.title: Implement Bracket Display
prompt_chain.description: Ensure the bracket display component shows all matches with proper styling and station colors
prompt_chain.test_criteria: Bracket is visually accurate with proper station colors (A=Primary, B=Chart-3, C=Chart-1)
prompt_chain.implementation_notes: Focus on visual accuracy and user experience

tdd_approach.test_first: Write tests for each bracket position and competitor assignment
tdd_approach.implementation: Implement bracket data structure and display logic
tdd_approach.verification: Verify all matches display correctly with proper station colors

success_criteria.all_competitors_loaded: All 22 competitors from the image are loaded into the bracket
success_criteria.correct_positions: All competitors are in their exact positions as shown in the image
success_criteria.proper_stations: Station assignments match the image (A, B, C with correct colors)
success_criteria.bracket_progression: Bracket flow from Round 1 to Final matches the image structure
success_criteria.visual_accuracy: Bracket display is visually accurate and matches the provided image
